name: Virtual Walk (Early Access)
description:
A demo for my first 2D platformer game using Unity.

You are the little virtual guy who wanders around the brand new area looking for food (those sweet cherries🍒)

The game movements including:

- Double jump, variable height jump, fall timer physics, coyote time... (Space)

- Dash while on the air or on the ground (Z)

- Launch vertically (C)

- Wall climbing, wall grabbing (hold shift while climbing)

- Wall sliding

For the early access all movements will be available.

Enjoy!!!
